amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete section 103 which prohibits Federal funding for abortions in the Federal prison system.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 32 in the Congressional Record of September 16, 1997 to delete the provisions in the bill that prohibit funding to perform abortions in the Federal Prison System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 264 (Roll no. 447).
